long: Meaning: properly, the "nearest" part, i.e. the "center", whether literal, figurative or adverbial (especially with preposition).  Usage: × among, × before, bowels, × unto charge,   eat (up), × heart, × him, × in, inward (× -ly, part, -s, thought), midst,   out of, purtenance, × therein, × through, × within self.  Source: from "H7126";
